notes: Kailangan expresses relational requirements between the agent and someone else or the society
Pwede requires the presence of alternatives (which could be contextually explicit but linguistically implicit). In the presence of such alternatives, pwede becomes more felicitous than siguro.

evidence: tgl-modal-evid20, tgl-modal-evid20c, tgl-modal-evid21, tgl-modal-evid21c, tgl-modal-evid22, tgl-modal-evid23

notes: strictly nonagentive when used for Circ. Poss.
Reviewer's intuition is that "siguro" is biased toward the truth of the prejacent, rather than just conveying possibility.
Dapat expresses requirement by law, rules (H.H. reports the necessity conveyed in dapat is weak compared to kailangan).

evidence: tgl-modal-evid43b, tgl-modal-evid45, tgl-modal-evid46, tgl-modal-evid46b, tgl-modal-evid47, tgl-modal-evid47c

notes: participant-internal agent ability prefix. (ka) is phonological reduplication
